57.eng-name: One-fifth of Booty to the Cause of Allah (Khumus)

hadiths.text: Narrated Aslam:`Umar said, "Were it not for those Muslims who have not come to existence yet, I would have distributed (the land of) every town I conquer among the fighters as the Prophet (ﷺ) distributed the land of Khaibar

chapter.eng-name: The war booty is for those who witness the battles
